member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.Lib.IBOReader
member.summary: Provides generic access to the GetList and GetRows methods of any Business Object

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Lib.IBOReader.GetCodeDescList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: To return the CodeDescriptionList values of a given table.field.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Lib.IBOReader.GetList(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get rows from any Business Object using its GetList method
member.param: Business Object to retrieve the rows from
The list of columns to get or blank to get all columns

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Lib.IBOReader.GetRows(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get rows from any Business Object using its GetRows method
member.param: Business Object to retrieve the rows from
The list of columns to get or blank to get all columns
